field.name: Character Name
field.dropzone: Drag and drop file here, or click to browse a file

placeholder.name: Douglas MacArthur
placeholder.traits: Enter traits here, make sure to separate by comma

remove-character.heading: Remove character?
remove-character.summary: Are you sure you want to remove the character "{name}" for the {tag} tag? This action cannot be undone.

purge-characters.heading: Remove all characters?
purge-characters.summary: Are you sure you want to purge or remove every character entry in the database? This action cannot be undone.

character-export.heading: Character Exporter
character-export.summary: Every characters defined in the database will be exported to the mod files; in the characters folder. This will however, overwrite the current definitions, be sure to create a backup before using this feature.

character-import.heading: Character Import
character-import.summary: Import character definitions from the mod files.

file-select.heading: Choose a file
file-select.summary: Browse and select a file to process

info.import-ext: You can use characters file or the localization file which has definitions for the ministers that will be imported. {end}

error.no-dir: No mod directory selected. You need to browse the root of your mod directory to get started.
error.no-characters-to-export: There are no characters to export

shine.heading: Focus GFX Shine Generator
shine.summary: Generate shines for sprites defined in FX_goals.gfx file.

character-recruit.heading: Append Characters to History Files
character-recruit.summary: Adds 'recruit_character' effects to the end of the history files

optimize-gfx.heading: Optimize Sprite Definitions
optimize-gfx.summary: Check whether sprite definitions does not have missing file paths.
